description: Measures will be relaxed from Monday, but the densely populated capital faces continuing curbs.
title: Coronavirus: Paris restrictions to stay as France reopens
title_page: Coronavirus: Paris restrictions to stay as France reopens - BBC News
maintext: Masks must be on worn on public transport, which will be disinfected at least once a day, and stores will have the right to ask shoppers to wear them. Social distancing rules will also stay in place.
